content:
TITLE: Installing Keystatic via NPX Command
DESCRIPTION: The command to create a new Keystatic project using npx. This command runs the Keystatic project creator, which will guide users through setting up a new project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/packages/create/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx create @keystatic
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Keystatic development environment
DESCRIPTION: Instructions for installing dependencies and running a development instance of Keystatic using pnpm. This includes installing packages and starting a development server from one of the example projects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm install
cd dev-projects/{example}
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Keystatic Next.js Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Next.js development server with Keystatic integration. This will make both the Keystatic admin UI and the Next.js frontend available locally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Keystatic-Astro Project
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the necessary dependencies for the Keystatic-Astro project using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Keystatic in Next.js
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies for the Keystatic Next.js template. This must be run before starting the development server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Environment Variables for Keystatic Dev App
DESCRIPTION: Required environment variables that need to be defined in a .env file for the Keystatic development application to function properly. These include authentication secrets for GitHub integration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/dev-projects/next-app/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
KEYSTATIC_SECRET=...
KEYSTATIC_GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=...
KEYSTATIC_GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=...
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Astro for Server-Side Rendering with Keystatic
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to set up Astro configuration for server-side rendering (SSR) which is now supported by Keystatic.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/packages/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// astro.config.mjs

export default defineConfig({
  output: 'server',
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Development Server for Keystatic-Astro Project
DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server for the Keystatic-Astro project, allowing you to view and work on the site locally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Remix Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Remix application in development mode, which rebuilds assets automatically when files are changed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/remix/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Remix Application for Production
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Remix application for production deployment, creating optimized assets.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/remix/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Astro Assets Support
DESCRIPTION: Details the addition of support for Astro assets with image directory and publicPath configuration in Keystatic. This enhances the content management capabilities with better asset handling.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- f47feaa7: Add support for Astro assets with image directory and publicPath in Keystatic config
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Astro Integration Update
DESCRIPTION: Details a change to the Astro integration that manages custom host configuration and enables usage with server output mode. This update simplifies the developer experience by removing the need for manual host configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- 6a60ab3c: Updates the Astro integration to manage the custom `127.0.0.1` host and enables usage with `output: 'server'`

  Keystatic used to require updating your `dev` script. It's now managed by the integration, feel free to simplify it!

  ```diff
  - "dev": "astro dev --host 127.0.0.1"
  + "dev": "astro dev"
  ```

  Moreover, Keystatic now lets you go full SSR! The following Astro config is now supported

  ```mjs
  // astro.config.mjs

  export default defineConfig({
    output: 'server',
  });
  ```
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Route Injection Feature
DESCRIPTION: Shows an implementation of automatic route injection in the Astro integration, replacing the need for manually created pages for Keystatic. This simplifies the setup process for developers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- b16ef684: Replace manually created pages for Keystatic with Astro integration that injects routes
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Next.js Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the Next.js development server using various package managers. This allows developers to run the application locally for development and testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/dev-projects/next-blocks-builder/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
# or
yarn dev
# or
pnpm dev
# or
bun dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Keystatic Create Locally for Development
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the Keystatic create tool locally during development. This allows developers to test the tool without publishing it.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/packages/create/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm dev:create
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Remix Application in Production Mode
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Remix application in production mode after building it.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/remix/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Structuring Figma Color Variables with Light/Dark Modes in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example of how Figma color variables are structured in JSON format, showing the collection with modes (Light/Dark), variable IDs, scopes, and resolved values for different color modes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/design-system/primitives/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "id": "collection-id",
  "name": "colors",
  "modes": {
    "1:0": "Light",
    "1:1": "Dark"
  },
  "variableIds": ["loads-of-ids"],
  "variables": [
    {
      "id": "token-id",
      "name": "alias/backgroundPressed",
      "type": "COLOR",
      "scopes": ["FRAME_FILL", "SHAPE_FILL"],
      "valuesByMode": {
        "1:0": {
          "type": "VARIABLE_ALIAS",
          "id": "id-of-token"
        },
        "1:1": {
          "type": "VARIABLE_ALIAS",
          "id": "id-of-token"
        }
      },
      "resolvedValuesByMode": {
        "1:0": {
          "resolvedValue": {
            "r": 0,
            "g": 0,
            "b": 0,
            "a": 0.114
          },
          "alias": "id-of-token",
          "aliasName": "scales/black"
        },
        "1:1": {
          "resolvedValue": {
            "r": 1,
            "g": 1,
            "b": 1,
            "a": 0.124
          },
          "alias": "id-of-token",
          "aliasName": "scales/white"
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Semantic Text Variant Structure Example in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example of how text variants (like headings) should be structured semantically in the design system, grouping all typography-related properties under a semantic name instead of using t-shirt sizes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/design-system/primitives/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"color": "{some.value}",
"fontFamily": "{some.value}",
"fontSize": "{some.value}",
"fontWeight": "{some.value}",
"lineHeight": "{some.value}",
"textTransform": "{some.value}",
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Improved Size Scale Token Naming Convention in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example of a proposed improvement for size scale token naming, recommending the use of pixel values as names rather than arbitrary numbering for better clarity and understanding.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/design-system/primitives/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
- '200': {
-   $value: '16px',
-   $type: 'dimension',
- }
+ '16': {
+   $value: '16px',
+   $type: 'dimension',
+ }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Initial Astro CLI Template
DESCRIPTION: Indicates the initial release of the Astro Keystatic CLI option and template, providing a starting point for Keystatic projects using Astro.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- 4fc2c61e: New Astro Keystatic CLI option + template
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Migration from deprecated fields.document to fields.markdoc in Keystatic
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows the migration from the deprecated fields.document to fields.markdoc in a Keystatic project as part of version 0.0.31 changes. This change was made in pull request #1164.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/nextjs/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Switch from deprecated `fields.document` to `fields.markdoc`
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Astro Version Upgrade
DESCRIPTION: Shows the upgrade of the template to Astro v3, indicating compatibility with the latest major version of the Astro framework.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- 36cb6803: Upgrading template to Astro v3
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Astro Dev Command for Keystatic Integration
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the recommended change to simplify the dev script in package.json since the integration now manages the custom host automatically.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/packages/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: diff
CODE:
```
- "dev": "astro dev --host 127.0.0.1"
+ "dev": "astro dev"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting a Field Type Change in Keystatic
DESCRIPTION: Shows a change from the deprecated fields.document to fields.markdoc in the Keystatic configuration. This is part of a pull request that updates the field type usage to the recommended approach.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- [#1164](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/pull/1164) [`be255f9`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/be255f9446c3e1b1c47cadcdd0e5154d7cffc68a) Thanks [@emmatown](https://github.com/emmatown)! - Switch from deprecated `fields.document` to `fields.markdoc`
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Host Configuration Change
DESCRIPTION: Details the addition of a --host flag to the Astro dev command, enhancing the development server configuration options.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- 2127a105: Add --host flag to astro dev command + version updates
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Markdoc Version Update
DESCRIPTION: Shows an update to the @astrojs/markdoc package version to fix a known bug, improving the stability of the Markdoc integration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- 14c8d90b: Update to @astrojs/markdoc version that fixes a known bug
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Dependency Version Updates in Changelog
DESCRIPTION: Chronicles dependency updates for @keystatic/core and @keystatic/remix packages, along with various patch changes including switching from fields.document to fields.markdoc and migrating to Vite.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/remix/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
### Patch Changes

- Updated dependencies [[`a129ea4`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/a129ea4ea46a5d9c2ddec8aef4313d98cf13a575), [`73aa1b8`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/73aa1b856b7100d1ac033eb16bee5e7f630a2c3e), [`73aa1b8`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/73aa1b856b7100d1ac033eb16bee5e7f630a2c3e), [`a1a71c1`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/a1a71c1ab2313c4c0a85fdce3f9a802a14580ece)]:
  - @keystatic/core@0.5.19
  - @keystatic/remix@5.0.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Version History - Markdown Changelog
DESCRIPTION: Changelog entries showing version updates and dependency changes for @keystatic/test-astro package, tracking changes to @keystatic/core and @keystatic/astro dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/dev-projects/astro/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# @keystatic/test-astro

## 0.0.126

### Patch Changes

- Updated dependencies [[`4a2a671`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/4a2a6715103fb900c78c4ef4ffeced2bb0d4765a), [`5d98a35`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/5d98a35a0b7691b9fb189bcf1072d6c9aee1d8c9)]:
  - @keystatic/core@0.5.47
  - @keystatic/astro@5.0.6
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Version History in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatted changelog entries documenting version changes from 0.4.3 to 0.7.19, including patch changes, bug fixes, and feature additions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/design-system/pkg/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# @keystar/ui

## 0.7.19

### Patch Changes

- [#1415](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/pull/1415) [`44afc1e`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/44afc1e05c8fe03c571b705989f4643d1a69f7bc) Thanks [@gautamsi](https://github.com/gautamsi)! - Fixed `buttonLabelBehavior` for `ActionGroup` not passed by `ActionBar`

- [#1430](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/pull/1430) [`4a2a671`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/4a2a6715103fb900c78c4ef4ffeced2bb0d4765a) Thanks [@emmatown](https://github.com/emmatown)! - Update `@react-aria`/`react-stately` dependencies
```

TITLE: Version Number Declarations
DESCRIPTION: Version headers and patch changes for @keystatic/templates-astro package showing dependency updates and version increments.

CODE:
```
# @keystatic/templates-astro\n\n## 0.0.60\n\n### Patch Changes\n\n- Updated dependencies [[`4a2a671`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/4a2a6715103fb900c78c4ef4ffeced2bb0d4765a), [`5d98a35`](https://github.com/Thinkmill/keystatic/commit/5d98a35a0b7691b9fb189bcf1072d6c9aee1d8c9)]:\n  - @keystatic/core@0.5.47\n  - @keystatic/astro@5.0.6
